location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra]

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has partially obscured the date, some of the body of the letter and almost all the signature. However, the date can still be clearly established.

mods.abstract: The letter is providing information on the movements of HMS Pitt.The context of the letter suggests that the author of this letter is almost certainly Nicholas Hankey Smith.
